fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the Factional Kill
- Perform the Factional Kill in addition to another Civilization. (Costs 7 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, all Civilizations including yourself are conversion immune and cannot have their role cards tampered with externally.
- This role cannot spawn with any conversion-capable Civilizations.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: “They were shot by a Scythian horse archer.” (Factional Kill)
